title: WTT - T206 Ty Cobb Polar Bear Bat Off SGC 3
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: WTT - T206 Ty Cobb Polar Bear Bat Off SGC 3
posts.post_content:
I have a nice Polar Bear Bat Off Cobb that I'd like to trade for a nice T205 Cobb PSA/SGC 3-4 grade. Looking for a nicely centered copy. Thanks for looking and your consideration.
